title: LiberiaLearn ICT — Grade 1 (FOUNDATION)
description: Day-1 full-subject shell. Offline-capable by default. Expand units/lessons iteratively while keeping student access to all grades/subjects.

community_connections: Connect tasks to home, market, school, and community roles.
cultural_context.language_notes: Use clear Liberian English; allow optional short clarifications in Liberian Koloqua where appropriate.

prerequisite_check: Basic reading of numbers/terms for the grade band
Prior grade key skills where applicable

common_misconceptions.correction: Require a short explanation or model before final answer.
common_misconceptions.misconception: Rushing to answers without explaining reasoning.

nested_content.title: Lesson 1 (Unit 1) — ICT Grade 1

learning_objectives.statement: Students can demonstrate the key idea for Lesson 1 in Unit 1.
success_criteria: Explains the concept in their own words
Solves at least 3 practice items accurately

nested_content.description: Day-1 lesson shell. Keep offline-capable. Expand with richer examples, practice, and teacher supports.

virtual_labs.title: Offline-first Guided Simulation
virtual_labs.household_alternative: Use paper, pencil, and simple objects (bottle caps/beans) to model the idea.
virtual_labs.description: A lightweight simulation concept that can be implemented later as HTML5; text-guided today.

steps.ai_tutor_hint: What changes? What stays the same?
steps.expected_observation: You notice a pattern that supports the lesson idea.
steps.instruction: Follow the guided steps to explore the concept.

feedback.partial: You’re close — fix the reasoning on the highlighted step.
feedback.incorrect: Let’s review the key step and try again.
feedback.correct: Good work — you showed clear understanding.

questions.question: Answer a core question that checks understanding for this lesson.
Solve one applied problem connected to real life.

differentiation.mixed_literacy: Read aloud option; use visuals; allow verbal explanation.
differentiation.struggling: Use simpler numbers/shorter text; provide worked example; reduce cognitive load.
differentiation.advanced: Add a challenge item with extension reasoning; ask for a second solution strategy.

activities.title: Guided + Independent Practice
activities.description: Short guided examples followed by independent items. Teacher checks misconceptions and gives targeted feedback.
